评论概述: Favorite glasses: great style, sit comfortably, help against light-induced migraines
评论详情: I had exactly the same pair of glasses for several years (bought in a small store that has since been closed) and really loved them. Besides the great style and comfort, the large coverage they provide really helped against light-induced migraines. I was very sad when the frame cracked suddenly a couple of weeks ago. So I went on Amazon and after a long thorough search I got lucky to find exactly the same glasses right here. Bought a pair right away and the next day ordered another pair with lighter tinted (sunset) lenses for winter days. Both are great. Lovelovelove them!!!
